prompt: Seamless tileable parchment board surface texture
materials: fibrous paper, faint grain, light speckling
palette: warm neutral beige, very low contrast
constraints: perfectly seamless tileable both directions; no grid lines, borders, symbols, or text; no watermark

prompt: Seamless tileable ink line texture for grid strokes, sparse irregular ink grain
constraints: transparent background; tileable both directions; monochrome black only; no text; no watermark

prompt: Repeating chevron border strip, graphic and vector-like, designed to tile horizontally
composition: long horizontal band centered in frame
constraints: tileable left-to-right; no perspective or lighting; transparent background; no text; no watermark

prompt: Corner ornament stamp, simple ornamental flourish, vector-like
constraints: transparent background; no text; no watermark

prompt: Special square glyph: four-point starburst icon
constraints: transparent background; monochrome only; no text; no watermark

prompt: Special square glyph: abstract angular knot mark
